name: Super Def Jam On Titan
description:
Did you ever, you know, hang around with your friends watching March Madness when you would rather be watching Attack on Titan? Have you ever been playing Charles Barkley Shut Up and Jam and thought "I wish this was more like Shadow of the Colossus?" Have you ever wanted to play a game where the soundtrack was entirely composed of 'Space Jam' remixes?

If you haven't stopped reading now, you're probably too invested to quit! Since you wont turn back... well, here you go.
